name: FFXV - Episode Umbra (Tomas Carvalho)
description:
You are Umbra. The loyal dog of Princess Lunafreya with a new letter to deliver to your Princess's Love, Noctis.

Travel through memorable areas of Eos, solving small puzzles to move on with your journey and deliver a message to Noctis.

Fan Game made on a Bitsy Game Jam in Universidade Lusófona.
